scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run tsc && gulp build
scripts.todemo: npm run build && rimraf ../cmpx-demo/node_modules/cmpx/src/** && rimraf ../cmpx-demo/node_modules/cmpx/bundles/** && gulp todemo
scripts.tomvc: npm run build && rimraf ../cmpx-demo/node_modules/cmpx/src/** && rimraf ../cmpx-demo/node_modules/cmpx/bundles/** && gulp tomvc
scripts.tonpm: npm run build && rimraf ../cmpx-npm/cmpx/src/** && rimraf ../cmpx-npm/cmpx/bundles/** && gulp tonpm
